title: Miley and Kaitlynn Were Spotted All Over Each Other on a Lunch Date, and Yes There Are Pics
text:
From Cosmopolitan

Miley Cyrus and Kaitlynn Carter were spotted getting their PDA on during a lunch date.

The pair have been dating since Miley's split from Liam Hemsworth was announced on August 11.

It looks like Miley Cyrus and Kailynn Carter's relationship is going pretty strong, because they couldn't have looked more into each other on a recent lunch date. The pair were seen getting a bite in Los Angeles with Miley's mom Tish, and legit couldn't keep their hands off of each other while walking through valet parking.

View photos Photo credit: KAMA - BACKGRID More

In case you're one of the few people remaining on this earth who is currently like "WAIT ISN'T SHE MARRIED TO LIAM HEMSWORTH," allow me to update you: Miley and Liam split up a few weeks ago—on the same day that photos of Miley and Kaitlynn making out in Italy were published online. It's all been very dramatic and extra, with Liam filing for divorce and Miley coming out with a breakup song called "Slide Away"—which she went ahead and performed at the VMAs.

And speaking of the VMAs, Kaitlynn was most definitely Miley's guest that night and they were spotted looking cute and holding hands on the way to the after-party.

View photos Photo credit: Getty Images More

In case you're wondering how Liam's doing in all this, he's been seen looking bummed on various beaches in Australia, and a source told ET that "At first, Liam wanted to just give it time, but he finally felt like things were getting nasty and he didn’t want to drag it out publicly. He decided it was all too much. [...] Liam loves Miley and is crushed by all of this. But right now, Miley doesn’t want to answer to anyone. She still feels the need to explore herself, her sexuality, and her music. Miley has been working in the studio and wants to blow off steam.”
